com.comphenix.protocol.injector

Interface InternalManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PacketStream, ProtocolManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DelayedPacketManager, PacketFilterManager

    public interface InternalManager
extends ProtocolManager
    Yields access to the internal hook configuration.
    Author:
    Kristian
